text: A Dark Enchanted Crystal Night is the first full-length album by the power metal band Crystallion. ==Track listing== # A Dark Enchanted Crystal Night - 0:55 # Guardians of the Sunrise - 5:17 # Visions - 8:05 # Eternia - 6:42 # Crystal Clear - 6:13 # Tears in the Rain - 7:00 # Dragonheart - 8:20 # Burning Bridges - 6:46 # The Final Revelation - 9:11 Category:2006 albums Category:Crystallion albums
title: A Dark Enchanted Crystal Night
